Title: The Freshman
Plot: Buffy moves into her dorm and attempts to adjust to college life. Everything around her seems to have changed without the constant interaction with the gang she had in High School. With Giles becoming a 'gentleman of leisure', Willow getting more and more excited about college and Xander still away on his road trip, she again believes that she must fight and survive on her own when she discovers a gang of tough vampires operating on campus.
GuestStars: Mark Silverberg, Jane Silvia, Jason Christopher, Evie Peck, Denice J. Sealy, Phina Oruche, Scott Rinker, Robert Catrini, Mace Lombard, Shannon Hillary, Mike Rad, Dagney Kerr, Pedro Balmaceda, Katharine Towne, Krist
